Summer Reading Skokie Public Library Lists Submissions

Let's go to camp

Get ready for an awesome summer of reading, learning, and fun. Sign up at the library or on the Bookmobile and get started with Base Camp, your orientation to Camp Curiosity.

Explore your interests

We have loads of camps for kids, teens, and adults. Pick one that matches your interests (or challenge yourself to explore something new).

  • Youth

  • Teens

  • Adults

Wear your progress

Get your camp lanyard and badge to keep track of your progress. Everyone who completes Base Camp gets a camp t-shirt too!
